The §aHPIC§r unlocks §3IV Energy Hatches§r and §3Dynamos§r... You know the drill!

Making an §3IV Chemical Reactor§r is §doptional§r. You can craft this with a §3Large Chemical Reactor§r if you wish.

If you wish to automate your LCR with patterns, head back to the P2P Tunnel Quest for more information.
